name: Ginger
properties: Weight-loss booster proven in randomized controlled trials
Works better in the morning than evening
Part of 21 Tweaks for weight loss
Can be used fresh or ground
benefits: Randomized controlled trials have found that 1/4 to 1-1/2 teaspoons a day of ground ginger significantly decreased body weight for just pennies a day. It can be as easy as stirring the ground spice into a cup of hot water. Ginger may work better in the morning than evening, and consider chai tea as a tasty way to combine the green tea and ginger tricks into a single beverage.
amount: 1 teaspoon of ground ginger daily (or equivalent fresh ginger)

quotes: Ground Ginger (1 teaspoon) or Cayenne (½ teaspoon) Randomized controlled trials have found that ¼ to 1½ teaspoons a day of ground ginger significantly decreased body weight for just pennies a day. It can be as easy as stirring the ground spice into a cup of hot water. Ginger may work better in the morning than evening, and consider chai tea as a tasty way to combine the green tea and ginger tricks into a single beverage.
